name: American Sound Amp Sim
details:
Great Fender tone from Joyo at a real value price! We know good tone when you hear it, and the Joyo American Sound JF-14 is modeled after a Fender 57 Deluxe amp. Allows you to go from pristine Fender clean, to smooth overdrive and everything in between.
Models the twang and clarity of a Fender 57 Deluxe
6 controls for shaping EQ and overdrive response: Low, Mid, High, Level, Voice, and Drive
Rugged Aluminum alloy casing
Dimensions: 11.8(L)X8.7(H)X3.8(W)cm
Uses a 9V Battery or 9V AC Adapter

http://www.joyoaudio.co.uk/JOYO-JF-14-american-sound-effect-pedal
